headline: Affirm Q2 Earnings Beat Estimates on Higher Transactions
summary: AFRM tops Q2 estimates with strong GMV and revenue growth, as higher transactions and repeat customers lift results despite rising costs.

headline: The Bull Case For Mastercard (MA) Could Change Following AI Push, Buyback Plan And Job Cuts - Learn Why
summary: In late January 2026, Mastercard reported full-year 2025 results showing sales of US$32,791 million and net income of US$14,968 million, alongside a new US$14 billion buyback authorization, a planned 4% workforce reduction with a US$200 million restructuring charge, and renewed issuing partnerships including Capital One and Scotiabank. At the same time, Mastercard pushed further into higher-value services by launching its Agent Suite for agentic AI and expanding offerings like Next Gen fleet...

At the same time, Mastercard pushed further into higher-value services by launching its Agent Suite for agentic AI and expanding offerings like Next Gen fleet...

headline: Ondo wants to rebuild prime brokerage on-chain — and perps are the first step
summary: Ondo showcases rapid growth in tokenized assets and unveils plans to turn that momentum into a full-stack on-chain financial services ecosystem at its summit.

headline: Visa takes a fresh crack at China's elusive payments market
summary: By pairing its real-time transfer app with China's UnionPay card, Visa is pursuing business in the huge country, where shifting regulations create hurdles for outside companies.

raw.headline: Visa takes a fresh crack at China's elusive payments market

headline: Rokt Joins American Heart Association's "Go Red. Shop with Heart" Initiative, Marks Kickoff at NYSE Bell Ringing
summary: Rokt, the leading ecommerce technology company using machine learning and AI to make transactions more relevant to each customer, today announced its participation in the American Heart Association's new "Go Red. Shop with Heart" retail initiative. Rokt joins a coalition of retailers, brands and platforms supporting the month-long campaign throughout February, recognized nationally as American Heart Month.
